text: Eudoxe Marcille (20 April 1814, Chartres – 7 April 1890, Chécy) was a French painter, museum director, art school director and art collector. His father François Marcille (1790–1856) and his younger brother Camille Marcille (1816–1875) were also art collectors. ==External links== *Musee-orsay.fr Category:1814 births Category:1890 deaths Category:French art collectors Category:19th-century French painters Category:French male painters
title: Eudoxe Marcille
